name: Medieval Fight Club - Online Multiplayer
description:
Experience fight clubs in the medieval ages and fight players from all around the world. If you enjoyed this game please leave a comment below :)

Currently, the game is in alpha state and the maximum concurrent players is 20. 

Controls: WASD or Arrows to move. To attack use "J" key or left/right mouse click.

You can change server region from the top left dropdown in the menu:

Asia: ASIA
Australia: AU
Canada East: CAE
Europe: EU
India: IN
Japan: JP
Russia: RU
South Africa: ZA
South America: SA
South Korea: KR
USA East: US
USA West: USW
